net.doo.snap.persistence

Class PictureProcessor

  • net.doo.snap.persistence.PictureProcessor

  • public class PictureProcessor

    Processes raw input (like bytes) using native libraries, saves result and generates new class Page

    See Also:
    class Page

      • processBytes

        public Page processBytes(kotlin.Array[] image,
                         int imageOrientation)

        Processes byte array using native libraries, saves result and generates new class Page

        Parameters:
        image - image in android.graphics.ImageFormat#JPEG format
        imageOrientation - image orientation in degrees
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@4ea44c02: class Page which is associated with processed image
        Throws:
        IOException - if image cannot be saved
